title: Perfect potato salad
ingredients: ['2.25kg red potatoes', '1 (20g) packet dry Italian salad dressing mix', '4 tablespoons tarragon vinegar', '4 tablespoons water', '250ml extra-virgin olive oil', '60g celery, chopped', '110g cooked streaky bacon, crumbled', '4 tablespoons chopped dill pickled cucumbers', '4 tablespoons chopped spring onions', '750ml mayonnaise']
